rukus.text: Watashi wa, shizunde yuku hoshi ni kakete chikau
Sore wa hontōni idaina chikaidearu. Moshi anata gata ni wakarunaraba
hontōni kore wa, hijō ni tōtoi kuruāndearu
(Soreha) hizō no keiten no naka ni (kaka rete ari)
kiyome rareta mono no soto, fureru koto ga dekinai
Ban'yū no nushi kara no keijidearu
Kore wa, anata gata ga karonjiru yōna oshiedearou ka
Mata anata gata wa (sore o) kyogidearu to mōshitate, anata gata no kurashi o tateru no ka
Sorenara anata gata wa,(rinjū no hito no tamashī ga) nodo moto o fusagu toki
(suwatte tada) mimamoru bakarina no ka
Ware wa anata ga tayori mo kare ni chikai nodearu. Daga anata gata ni wa mie wa shinai
Anata gataga moshi (raise no) mukui o jogai sa rete iru to iu nonara, anata gata wa naze
sono (tamashī) o (tainai ni) yobimodosanai no ka. Moshi anata gataga, shinjitsu (o katatte iru no)naraba
Moshi kare ga,(arrā) ni chikadzuke rareta monodearunara
(kare ni taisuru hōshō wa) anshin to man'etsu, soshite shifuku no rakuendearu
Moshi kare ga, migite no nakamadearunaraba
anata ni heian'are.' To migite no nakama kara (aisatsu sa reru)
Mo shikare ga, uso-tsuki de, mayotta monodearunaraba
nietatsu yu no taigū o uke
goku hi de yaka reyou
Hontōni kore wa, yurugi no nai tashikana shinridearu
Dakara idaide ara reru anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
